rules_text:
For each legendary permanent you control, this spell costs one mana of one of that permanent’s colors less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
For each color, create a token that’s a copy of a different legendary permanent you control of that color, except the token isn’t legendary.
Exile The Tale of Kings.
notes:
white blue black red green 
five color
For each legendary permanent you control, this spell costs one less of that permanent’s colors.
